DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to understand the effect of age on language abilities. The investigators aim at investigating the cerebral modifications that take place in normal aging, at the functional an anatomical level.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Normal Aging on Language Processing
DOC.criteria: Age of 30 years and above Right handed French native speakers Affiliation to French social security (Sécurité Sociale) Medical interview Consent form signed Cerebral or respiratory pathologies Any MRI contrindication
